content: The biggest problem with immigration is its multicultural character. The trouble is not that workers migrate when necessary, but the insurmountable cultural gap that separates them from the host societies. Without going any further, Muslim immigration in Europe is a good example.
translations: ita:Il più grande problema dell'immigrazione è il suo carattere multiculturale. Il problema non è che i lavoratori migrano q
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
